Class DataTablesControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gephi.datalab.impl.DataTablesControllerImpl

    DataTablesCommonInterface, DataTablesController

    public class DataTablesControllerImpl
extends Object
implements DataTablesController
